ComplexNFTGemClaimCreated(address,addres.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is created using ETH

ComplexNFTGemClaimRedeemed(address,addre.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is redeemed

ComplexNFTGemCreated(address,address,uin.details: Event generated when a gem is created

ComplexNFTGemERC20ClaimCreated(address,a.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is created using ERC20 tokens

ComplexNFTGemERC20ClaimRedeemed(address,.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is redeemed

addAllowedToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: the public version of the above

addInputRequirement(ComplexPoolLib.Compl.details: add an input requirement for this token

addToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolData.details: get token id (serial #) of the given token hash. 0 if not a token, 1 if claim, 2 if gem

allTokenHashes(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoo.details: get token id (serial #) of the given token hash. 0 if not a token, 1 if claim, 2 if gem

claimAmount(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: the claim amount for the given claim id

claimQuantity(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPool.details: the claim quantity (count of gems staked) for the given claim id

claimTokenAmount(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexP.details: claim token amount if paid using erc20

claimUnlockTime(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: the lock time for this claim. once past lock time a gema is minted

collectClaim(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: collect an open claim (take custody of the funds the claim is redeeemable for and maybe a gem too)

createClaims(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: attempt to create a claim using the given timeframe

createERC20Claims(ComplexPoolLib.Complex.details: crate multiple gem claim using an erc20 token. this token must be tradeable in Uniswap or this call will fail

increaseDifficulty(ComplexPoolLib.Comple.details: increase the pool's difficulty by calculating the step increase portion and adding it to the eth price of the market

mintGenesisGems(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: mint the genesis gems earned by the pools creator and funder

nextClaimHash(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPool.details: the hash of the next claim to be minted

nextGemHash(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: the hash of the next gem to be minted

removeAllowedToken(ComplexPoolLib.Comple.details: the public version of the above

stakedToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: the staked token if staking with erc20
